msContents.summary: List of taxpayers; the payments were in wheat, barley and lentils

msItem.note: Written along the fibers; on the back P.Col. V 1 verso 5
In general the names are in alphabetical order, with a few exceptions
Some names are accompanied by check marks indicating that these people had paid
There are several cases of payments with conversion from one type of produce to another
The list was checked by an official who left some marginal notations

13 cols. of writing, 11 of them in good condition; 18 lines in col. 1; 26 lines in col. 2; 20 in col. 3; 18 in col. 4; 17 in col. 5; 17 in col. 6; 14 in col. 7; 18 in col. 8; 22 in col 9; 18 in col. 10; 18 in col. 11; 18 in col. 12; only traces in col. 13

provenance.p: Purchased by Columbia University from M. Nahman through H.I. Bell, in July 1923; no. 1,6 (Lot II) in Bell's inventory

listBibl.bibl: P.Col. II 1 recto 6 About the people cf. P.Stras. IX 827-830, 846 and 849; about dating to 157 AD, see P.Stras. IX 849 p. 78; restorations in col. 1.1 and col. 9.14 in BL IX p. 60
